a.style: font-family:'Playfair Display', Georgia, 'Times New Roman', 'Liberation Serif', serif

text.tspan: Lung cancer death rates, United States, 1950 to 2021
Number of lung, bronchus and trachea cancer deaths per 100,000 people.
Note: To allow for comparisons between countries and over time, this metric is age-standardized. All deaths in a country may not have
been registered with a cause of death.
